actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to enable the Secretary of Agriculture to extend financial assistance to desert-land entrymen to the same extent as such assistance is available to homestead entrymen.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to extend loans to persons who make a desertland entry on public land. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 1006(a))

titles.title: A bill to enable the Secretary of Agriculture to extend financial assistance to desert-land entrymen to the same extent as such assistance is available to homestead entrymen.
